forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds N at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early. Mostly sunny skies along with windy conditions this afternoon. High 52F. Winds N at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h, becoming SE and decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph, becoming ESE and decreasing to less than 5 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
